snippet: Three young brothers were found stabbed to death Wednesday inside a vehicle parked outside a South Los Angeles elementary school, and the police say their father is the only suspect.
abstract: Three young boys are found stabbed to death in sports utility vehicle parked near elementary school in South Los Angeles; boys' father, who was found with stab wounds and is in critical condition, is prime suspect.
lead_paragraph: Three young brothers were found stabbed to death Wednesday inside a vehicle parked outside a South Los Angeles elementary school, and the police say their father is the only suspect.

headline.main: California: 3 Young Brothers Found Stabbed to Death in Car Outside School
headline.print_headline: California: 3 Young Brothers Found Stabbed to Death in Car Outside School
